msg.msgText:
A "MQTTClient" can be deleted using the "delete" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver delete MQTTClient help imaserver delete MQTTClient "Name=value"
EXAMPLE: imaserver delete MQTTClient "Name=TestClient"
NOTE: To get a list of disconnected MQTT clients, use "imaserver stat MQTTClient" command.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
